Sentence.value: Your health care provider inserted a catheter (flexible tube) into an artery through an incision (cut) in your groin or your arm.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Your health care provider inserted a catheter (flexible tube) into an [[artery|C0003842]] through an incision (cut) in your [[groin|C0018246]] or your arm.

Sentence.value: Your provider used live x-rays to carefully guide the catheter up to the area of the blockage in your carotid artery.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Your provider used live [[x-rays|C0043299]] to carefully guide the catheter up to the area of the blockage in your [[carotid artery|C0007272]].

Sentence.value: To lower your chances of this happening: - Eat healthy foods, exercise (if your provider advises you to), stop smoking (if you smoke), and reduce your stress level.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: To lower your chances of this happening: - Eat healthy foods, [[exercise|C0015259]] (if your provider advises you to), stop smoking (if you smoke), and reduce your [[stress|C0038435]] level.

Sentence.value: - If you are taking medicines for blood pressure or diabetes, take them the way you have been told to take them.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - If you are taking [[medicines|C0013227]] for [[blood pressure|C1272641]] or [[diabetes|C0011847]], take them the way you have been told to take them.

Sentence.value: - Your provider may ask you to take aspirin and/or another medicine called clopidogrel (Plavix), or another medicine, when you go home.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - Your provider may ask you to take aspirin and/or another medicine called [[clopidogrel|C0070166]] ([[Plavix|C0633084]]), or another medicine, when you go home.
